      Asserts whether studentA and studentB can swop index

      Retrieves Index given indexNo

      Returns the maximum number of students enrolled in the index identified by indexNo

      void CourseController.swopIndex​(Student studentA, int indexNoA, Student studentB, int indexNoB)

      Adds an index to this timetable with status Registered

      Add student to this index
      void Timetable.assertAddIndex​(Index add)
      Check if add can be added to this timetable without any clash.
      void Timetable.assertAddIndex​(Index add, Index remove)
      Check if add can be added to this timetable without any clash after removing remove.
      private void Student.assertCanLogin()
      Determine whether a student is allowed to login based on the current time and access period configured.

      Drops the student from the target index.

      Gets Course from a course code input

      Retrieves the index identified by indexNo
      Index Course.getStudentIndex​(Student student)
      Check if the student is already enrolled/in the waitlist of one of the indexes of this course
      boolean Student.login​(java.lang.String password)
      Override the base login to only allow the student to login if the current time is within the configured access period
      boolean User.login​(java.lang.String password)
      Compare the hash of the user's entered password with the password hash stored for that user in the database.
      static User User.login​(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Validates a user's login by verifying that their username and password matches the entry in the database.
      boolean Course.register​(Student student, int indexNo)
      Registers the student to the target index
      void Course.swopIndex​(Student studentA, int indexNoA, Student studentB, int indexNoB)

      Methods in mystars.tests that throw AppException 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) void CourseControllerTest.setUp()
      Before each test, this method wipes the storage object since no valid file was found.
      (package private) void LessonTest.test_clash()
      Ensure that lesson clashing is handled correctly
      (package private) void CourseControllerTest.test_creation()
      Test for the creation of a new course in a selected school.
      (package private) void CourseControllerTest.test_dropping()
      Test for the dropping of a course by a student.
      (package private) void CourseControllerTest.test_registration()
      Test for the registration of a course by a student.
      (package private) void CourseControllerTest.test_swop()
      Test for the swopping of an index by a student with another student.
      (package private) void TimetableTest.test_timetable()
      Ensure that the max AU limit is applied correctly
      (package private) void StudentTest.test_unique()
      Ensure that detection of students with duplicate username/matric no functions correctly
      (package private) void CourseControllerTest.test_waitlist()
      Test for the successful assigning of a student to the index if there are vaccancies.
